column1: Great time with so many patriots dedicated to fighting for our community state and country at the opening of the new @HamCoGOP HQ in Pendleton. On to victory up and down the ballot in November! @ChairmanAlex @robportman https://t.co/nIDCdNzSfk

Big thanks to guest host @MarkSteynOnline for having me on "The Rush Limbaugh Show" to outline how Democrats have made a mockery of due process and the Constitution through their obsession with impeaching our president @realDonaldTrump. https://t.co/A7kg0GDt9u

Great time talking with @seanhannity today about the Democrats' sham of an #impeachment and all the other priorities from infrastructure to the opioid crisis the House should have been focused on instead.  https://t.co/RoKZe41i3r

I'm excited to start 2020 with my campaign in a stronger position than ever before to highlight my record of delivering results for hardworking Ohio families and establish a contrast with my opponents who are obsessed with impeachment and a radical agenda https://t.co/obaqltNEKB

It’s official. For just the 3rd time in our nation’s 243-yr history a president has been impeached. Dems made history for all the wrong reasons. It's time to reject their partisan abuse of power and focus on delivering results for hardworking OH families. https://t.co/12uGVeFZuI

I am fighting to combat the opioid crisis end sex trafficking create jobs lift wages and support Ohio small businesses. I look forward to earning the support of Ohio voters next year and continuing to fight for common-sense results for Ohio families.  https://t.co/4CcfOzXGFe
Biden's excuses are a bunch of #malarkey.  https://t.co/4J0MX2ZK8L

Thank you @IngrahamAngle for having me on to discuss the impeachment farce! One Democrat even said they have to impeach @realDonaldTrump or he might be reelected. It's time to focus on results for hardworking families and end this hyper partisan charade.  https://t.co/WezAAna8Eg

By pushing ahead with their impeachment craze without any semblance of fairness or due process Democrats prove their objective is to undo the results of the 2016 election. That's why I am fighting hard to defend our president and get DC back to work.  https://t.co/d0BVB5pfBt
Great time attending the campaign kickoff for Hamilton County Prosecutor @VoteJoeDeters in Sharonville and running into our ORP chairman @JaneyMurph! https://t.co/lRsPn3pdpQ
Democrats in the House are abandoning any semblance of bipartisanship and undermining due process in their hyper-partisan quest for impeachment. https://t.co/GDdw43yU7E
Thank you to all the men and women who have worn the uniform and served to protect our great nation and the freedoms we cherish. #veteransday2019 https://t.co/u5yRUDDDYL

I will continue fighting to stop the Democrats’ out-of-touch agenda and deliver common sense conservative results for Ohio families and am honored to have the support of organizations like @SBAList in that battle.  https://t.co/PH9BqMvWBq
ICYMI: The difference between how the Clinton impeachment was conducted and the Democrats’ current farce is all about due process.   https://t.co/be0aUpMsXs

Excellent time last week with @Willie700WLW on the Bill Cunningham Show discussing the Democrats' impeachment hysteria and my fight to deliver common sense conservative results for Ohio families.  https://t.co/rQpzr4Nq9v
Thank you to @Willie700WLW for having me on the show this afternoon to talk about Democrats' impeachment obsession and more!

I believe the people’s House should spend its time doing the work of the people rather than engaging in baseless partisan witch hunts.  Unfortunately far-left politicians like Nancy Pelosi and my Democratic opponents choose resistance over results.  https://t.co/1VIFbKDfsW

Incredibly honored to have the support and endorsement of Hamilton County GOP chair @ChairmanAlex and Warren County GOP chair Jeff Monroe. Working together we can continue to deliver conservative results for hardworking Ohio families.  https://t.co/5P1tBmoCls
I’m honored and grateful to have @JaneyMurph’s support and endorsement for reelection so I can continue fighting to deliver conservative results for Ohio families. https://t.co/vyuD8Ct7lp
Great to stop by Kleather’s Pumpkin Patch in Springboro with Donna. https://t.co/5CekcnE7PT
Great time this weekend attending the Sauerkraut Festival in Waynesville. https://t.co/TDjwbSq6Hi

Honored to have the support and endorsement of @cfgAction one of the most effective supporters of conservatives in the country.  I look forward to continuing to serve our community by fighting for common sense conservative results.  https://t.co/GOzeRq4S6z
Great time and amazing crowd at the Green Township Republican Club’s spaghetti dinner last night. https://t.co/yAql21MZQy

Excited to say I've raised $420K in Q3 the best off-year fundraising haul in my congressional career! I’m incredibly grateful for all the hardworking Ohio families who have invested in our effort and look forward to continuing to serve our community in Washington. #OHpolitics
Great time last night with friends and supporters at the @HamCoGOP Rising Republicans Wine Tasting! #GOP https://t.co/cO0oZVpoev

Honored to have the endorsement of my friend and colleague Congressman Jim Jordan. Together we are fighting hard for common sense conservative results for hardworking Ohio families. @ohiogop #OHpolitics https://t.co/dTnX278zYI

I'm proud to have the support of my friend and colleague Rep. Jim Jordan a fierce advocate for conservative solutions and fighter of the left's impeachment hysteria. Thank you! #OHpolitics https://t.co/ILxgj7QtTZ

Tremendous event with my friend and colleague Congressman Jim Jordan at the Great Wolf Lodge in Warren County last night. Thank you to the dozens of folks who came out to show your support! #OHpolitics https://t.co/06xZiT5011
Great time this afternoon at Senator  @SteveWilsonOH’s 3rd Annual Wilson Family Picnic at Armco Park in Warren County. https://t.co/xTKYecVevl

Honored to speak this weekend at an event supporting Supreme Court Justices @JudgeJudi Sharon Kennedy and so many of our other great #GOP candidates for judicial and local office in Warren County. https://t.co/P0OQDRgvoJ
Wonderful time supporting all of our tremendous GOP candidates at the Hamilton County Republican Party’s Meet the Candidate Night in Cheviot tonight. https://t.co/rCpaef12wV
Excellent time this evening at the St. Jude’s Oktoberfest in Green Township. Thanks to everyone who stopped to chat with me! https://t.co/34c9OMqbfM
Great time visiting Applefest at the Warren County fairgrounds and the Lebanon Feast & Fall-y Festival. Good to meet and talk with so many constituents! https://t.co/48aHuYvbtY

I believe the people’s House should spend it’s time doing the work of the people — delivering results. But not Nancy Pelosi and her allies like my opponents @NikkiFosterOH and @KateForCongress. They want to divide America with their obsessive push for #impeachment.

This is the problem with the radical left. All they care about is tearing down the president with incendiary rhetoric. They have no interest in results and root against our economy everyday. https://t.co/xzSG3lvFJu

Far-left Democrats like Nancy Pelosi and my opponent @NikkiFosterOH are obsessed with #impeachment. Enough with the sideshow in DC. I’m focused on what matters to hardworking Ohio families like combatting the opioid epidemic cutting taxes and supporting small businesses.
Great time this morning rallying Super Saturday volunteers for @mattforohio and our other excellent GOP candidates! Dedicated volunteers like these are how we win. #OHPOL https://t.co/U76nwDFqjp
Amazing time tonight meeting so many great people at Oktoberfest Zinzinnati! #Cincinnati #octoberfest https://t.co/q1Dkpvwr4k
Excited to have the most respected campaign compliance expert in Ohio on the Chabot for Congress team.  https://t.co/ppw9yDDKzW
Great time this evening talking with folks at the St. Teresa of Avila Catholic Church festival in West Price Hill! https://t.co/XKDeIIgkVF
Congratulations Dan Bishop on a hard fought victory! Strong conservative principles prevail! #Chabot2020 https://t.co/tdCjiQgg73

Fired up @realDonaldTrump just took the stage here in Cincinnati! Send the President a strong message of support help him and our entire Republican slate win in 2020.  Pitch in anything before the rally ends and it will be triple-matched!  https://t.co/ucy9BZwe5L
Team Chabot had a great time attending the Green Township Republican Club meeting last night. Great turnout! https://t.co/YkDJGuTSoM
